result = max(result, l - a[-1])
print(result)

from sys import stdin


def main():
    n, l = list(map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    aa = sorted(map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    maxgap = max(aa[0], l - aa[-1]) * 2
    a = aa[0]
    for b in aa:
        gap, a = b - a, b
        if maxgap < gap:
            maxgap = gap
    return maxgap / 2


print(main())

n,l = map(int,input().split())
di = list(map(int,input().split()))
di = sorted(di)
maximum = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    if di[i+1]-di[i]>maximum:
        maximum = di[i+1]-di[i]
if float(maximum)/2 > di[0] and float(maximum)/2 > l - di[-1]:
    if maximum % 2== 0:
        print(maximum//2,end=".0000000000")
    else:
        print(maximum//2,end=".5000000000")
elif l - di[-1]>di[0]:
    print(l - di[-1],end=".0000000000")
else:
    print(di[0],end=".0000000000")

A=list(map(int,input().split()))
L=list(map(int,input().split()))
L.append(-(min(L)))
L.sort()
def Fasl(Array):
   Out=0
   for I in range(len(Array)-1):
      if Array[I+1]-Array[I]>Out:
         Out=Array[I+1]-Array[I]
   return Out
fasl=Fasl(L)/2
If=A[1]-max(L)
if If>fasl:
    print(If)
else:
    print(fasl)
R = lambda : map(int, input().split())

n, l     = R()
lights   = sorted(list(R()))
lights_2 = [0] + lights + [l]

res = [[lights_2[i], lights_2[i+1]] for i in range(n+2-1)]

MAX = [[0,0],0]
for pair in res:
    if pair[0] not in lights or pair[1] not in lights:
        if abs(pair[0] - pair[1]) > MAX[1]:
            MAX = [pair, abs(pair[0] - pair[1])]
    else:
        if abs(pair[0] - pair[1])/2 > MAX[1]:
            MAX = [pair, abs(pair[0] - pair[1])/2]

print(MAX[1])
